title: Holiday
body:
I feel bad that I seriously suck at posting. I just over analyze everything. I wrote this LAST year during holiday season and we are right around the corner from that. But here you go 

All day Harry had been doing it. All damn day! It was your first holiday together and you and Harry had decided to host dinner. You had the recipes from your mother and his. You followed the recipes to a ‘T’ ;however all day Harry kept interjecting.

“lets add a little brown sugar!”,“take the cookies out luv might burn the bottom, don wan tha”,“add more salt not there yet kinda bland”,“dice them smaller want the taste not the chunks”, “You have to baste it often or it would dry up up top”, “lets add this(wine) make the taste more bold!”

And now he had just hip bumped you over to the side complaining the sauce was burning and you weren’t stirring it fast enough turning down the  heat even after you said you got it he was still micromanaging, taking over. You huffed grabbing a bottle of water from the fridge, before going up the stairs to get ready they were arriving in 2 hours you were so angry you slam the door behind you. It was the slam that caught his attention quickly he jogged up the  stairs “Pet re yeh alright?”

“Yes!” you yell from inside the closet

“Wha’ re yeh doin’?”

“Getting ready!”

“K m gonna head down i added some red wine to the sauce it tastes amazing!” he said excitedly 

“Ok!” you say disinterested. You wanted this to be perfect you wanted his family to know you could be a great home keeper and take care of him. More importantly you wanted everyone to know you would be a great wife when the time came but Harry proved you wrong. You worried that maybe his micromanaging was because you were a terrible home keeper the readjustment of pillows and table scaping on the dining table and trinkets around your shared home. He thought you didn’t realize but you did, you thought nothing of it at first but, now it was like a sign a subliminal loud bright neon sign ‘you are shit at this!’

You get ready on a simple dress with a floor length cardigan on. 

“Ready?” Harry asks walking into the bathroom

“Yes” you answer

He wraps his arms around you “wow babe yeh look amazin’ ” 

“Thanks” you say flatly pushing him off

 He doesn’t catch on he’s too excited. Excited to see his family. 

When everyone arrived they greet you both with loving arms and messages bringing you  both gifts. Immediately you usher them to the dining room as they admire the new décor around the house. You go to open a bottle of wine only for Harry to grab it out of your hand

“I got this have a seat babe, know there’s a way to pour wine” he fills the glasses before raising his “to family nd luv’ ”

You all repeat  “to family and love” clanking each others glasses 

“lets eat!” 5 minutes pass by and there’s the first compliment

“This chicken is soo good have you tried it mum?”  Gemma asks

“Not yet still eating the risotto it’s amazing!” 

“Yea Y/N you did a good job!” your mom speaks to you

You shake your head “I didn’t cook Harry did, good job babe” and honestly it really was good 

“Harry you cook!?” your mom asks surprised

“Yes Mrs. Y/L/N” he says proudly 

“Oh good! Is there nothing you can’t do?”

He smiles in response loving the compliment 

“Anyway we were worried Y/N would be feeding you box dinners and take out everyday!”  she jokes making everyone else laugh. You give a tight lipped smile 

“Oh no she did most of the work I just helped”  

“Really is it true butterfly (your nickname)?” your mom asks you 

You sigh “No Harry cooked” you say once again shaking your head 

“You know I always got on her on learning to cook! Back in my day women had to know how to cook or you wouldn’t get married!” 

“That’s very true Hazza your mimi would get on me all the time” Anne chimes in

“Oh silly tradition” Harry reasons 

“Yea but i still think she should learn something if she wants to be a mother” your father scolds “mac and cheese even”

“I’ll learn dad so i can feed you when you’re old” you try to joke back making the table laugh a little

“Oh i don’t mind..”  

“Harry what did you put in this chicken?” Gemma’s Boyfriend Sean asks

 He smiles “I’ll give you the recipe mate ” 

“Please do so i can impress your sister”  he jokes

The rest of dinner went without  much word from you and afterwards you all stay seated around the dining table eating dessert drinking more wine and coffee 

“Oh my god Hazza! Yeh baked the cookies too?!” Anne asks after her first  bite

“Yes” you answer flatly for him 

“Damn did you do anything today?” your father asks you

“No she..” Harry tries to answer for you 

“I cleaned” you respond 

“Wha’s in this?” Gemma  asks as she holds up a piece of cake on her fork

“So  good!” your mom comments

 “And soft!” his mom adds

He shrugs smirking loving the compliments “can’t give away all my recipes!”  

“Yea but this is my recipe what did yeh add?” his mom asks 

He draws his lips together before imitating a zipper being closed on them with his fingers .You want this night to be over already by now. Your pride is defeated. Nothing that you did went right and everyone knows you can’t do much of anything. Your mom was relentless about your lack of cooking skills the alcohol getting to her which makes everyone laugh all night at you. When they start leaving you smile and say your goodbyes kissing away any hopes of being Mrs. Styles  because there’s no way Anne Twist is  going to let you marry her son not when you couldn’t even bake cookies! 

You rush to the kitchen to clean up the dishes. Harry walks into the kitchen happily sighing “you’re dad is funny!” 

“Yea!” you say focusing all your negative energy on the spots on the dishes

“Do they really call you butterfly?” he asks amused

“Yea” you say flatly 

“Cute!” he says with a boyish grin 

You plug away going through the dishes quickly

“Oh don’t clean those we can do it tomorrow” he  tries to stop you from cleaning the pots 

“I would rather do it tonight” you say not stopping 

“Well m tired from all that cooking I did” he jokes “mind  if i watch some tele?” 

“No!” you say feeling your anger coming to a boil. Your feet were sore all he did all day was sit by the island micromanaging only getting up to fix your mistakes. He kisses you on the cheek before walking away. You spend about an hour cleaning up. 

“I’m done going upstairs” you say to Harry as you dry your hands

 “ ‘M coming wait’f me” he says turning off the TV. He hums walking up with you

You’re so irritated at this point you’re rolling your eyes at the littlest things as you walk into the closet as he follows

He chuckles "Gem is crazy!” he says remembering a joke she told 

You look around ignoring him “And your mum calling me ‘great’ that was endearing of her, she’s such a darling ” he says smiling watching you

“Yea” you respond not paying attention to him. Finally  he realizes you’re  in a sour mood

“Yeh ok pet?” he asks staring at you angrily shuffle through things in the drawer

“Yea!” you say sarcastically  

“Harry the great!” you grunt pulling open the drawer 

“What?”  he chuckles slightly 

“Harry the great!” you start as you undress aggressively  

“Harry the great singer! Harry the great musician! Harry the great producer! Harry the great actor! Harry  the great chef!” you slam the drawer closed

He laughs at your antics “where’s this comin from?”

"Y/N the walking sack of shit who cant even boil water” you speak walking around picking up your discarded clothes

His laughter quickly dies down realizing what you said “wait what?”

You sigh walking into bathroom mumbling ”Y/N the terrible! Y/N the terrible chef eat her food and you might die!” you’re being theatrical and sarcastic waving your hands in the air to keep from  crying

 “Babe” his brow furrows. Unsure if you’re joking or not

“Y/N the shitty homemaker! Y/N waste of space!” 

“Oi!” he yells “stop it! wha’s gotten yeh in this pissy mood?” he asks realizing you were very serious 

“Nothing!” you say walking past him 

“Wha do yeh mean nothin?  wha’s up with the attitude?” He asks following you into the bedroom

“I’m fine, good night” you answer softly He watches you yank the covers back before getting in bed. He stares before going into the closet to change clothes. He has no idea why you are in such a bad mood you seemed fine earlier. He gets in bed and looks at you one more time“Y/N” he calls moving closer to you  

“Good night Harry” you stress softly turning away from him hiding your tears, he sighs turning the  other way.

In the morning you’re gone without good morning

Harry: no good morning today? he texts you 

Y/N: sorry big meeting today

He  knows you’re lying you would have told him earlier that week if it was true

Harry: whats wrong pet

Y/N: nothing. im cool as a cucumber

 Y/N: gotta go text later love you

He still can’t understand what happened so he calls Alexa his best friend to figure things out 

“Harold!

”“Aallleeeexaaaa!” he says 

She  laughs “up early” 

“Well couldn’t sleep” 

“Please Harry  my precious ears don’t need to hear that!” she  complains 

He chuckles “no i think Y/N is mad at me” 

“What did you do?”

“Nothing!”

“Uh huh so shes mad for no reason?” she asks “

Yes!”

“Harry” she doesn’t  believe him 

“I did nothing i promise!” 

“Well lets just  figure out where you went wrong”

He sighed in response 

“Oh how was the  dinner by the way?” 

“Amazing everyone had a blast!” he said smiling

“Good. Sooo did you call her fat?” 

“Really? no”

“Just asking….insult her cooking?”  

“ M not stupid no” Alexa laughed “But she kept telling everyone i cooked don’ kno why”

“Did you?”

“Well…”

“Seriously?” she said in a flat tone 

“I didn’t cook that much she did majority of it!” he argued

*So let me guess you did the Harry thing overshadowed?” 

“No i didnt!” he defends himself

“So you didn’t  add your own ingredients?” He remained silent 

“Uh huh! i see told her to do it your way instead” 

He  sighed “just trying to help” he mumbled  

“Not like that you idiot!”

“Oi!” 

“You do that shit to me all the time  its really annoying can’t  imagine being your girlfriend and trying to impress your family” she sang the last part 

“Oooh” he responded softly

“Yea oooh”

“Fuck” he whispered “i was just”

“Just nothing you fucked up” she teased

He sighed  “now what do i do?”

“I don’t know thats a doozy, i gotta run text me when you come up with a resolution maybe i can save you more trouble!”

He honestly was just trying to help. He could apologize plus your cooking wasn’t that bad. He had no time to think of other ideas because he was to be at the studio soon. 

Even though he was in the studio his mind drifted to you often so he snuck away to call you.“Hello?”  you answer 

“Hi butterfly” he speaks softly 

“Hi Harry” you greet. “Are you ok?” he never calls when he’s in the studio

“Yea….hows your day?”

You shrug “just work..” its awkward “how’s yours?”

“Good ok i guess… can we talk bout last night?”

“No” you say in a flat tone

“Come on pet i…” 

You interrupt him “im not talking about it so if you have nothing to say im hanging up” you’re beyond irritated 

“No don’t!”…  he  remained silent “Y/N” 

“Harry” your tone  warns him

He feels worse “pet please”

“Go back you have things to do” you reason  “see you at home I love you” 

He sighed deeply “love you too” He did his best rushed through songs. You however didn’t get  home till late and you met a sleeping Harry. You did your best to be silent and sneak into bed but he felt the dip in the mattress.

“Pet?” he asks turning his head to face you 

“Yes good night” you say  kissing his lips and laying  down

He sighs turning on his lamp “Y/N” 

“Go back to sleep Harry” you stress 

“No not good night!” he says turning you around to face him “Now we’re gonna talk about this whether yeh like it or not!”

“Harry” you fuss

“Seriously over dinner?” You look at him with a blank  face “I didn’t even do anything was jus’ trying to help I’m sorry if i offended yeh” now he was the one that was irritated  You still say nothing as he is looking at you for a response  “Yeh could have said yeh cooked i wouldn’t have minded its just food!” You still give him a blank stare “Oh for the luv of! Bloody say something!” he commands 

You sigh and turn to look at the ceiling “it wasn’t a stupid dinner maybe to you it was but it meant more than that to me” you feel the tears well up. “I was supposed to make it perfect the whole house but you kept fixing things.” The first  tear rolled down your face “then you wouldn’t let me cook i had the recipes i was doing exactly what was written down. Then here you come correcting and adding shit. You undermined everything i did that day, like you didn’t trust that i could make anything good enough for your family.” You now dig the heels of your hands to your eyes trying to stop the flow

“Pet” he said softly feeling awful about his actions 

“What mother wants her son to be with a woman who can’t even cook Harry?!”. 

He frowned “my mum” 

“You wouldn’t even let me pour a glass of wine!”

He remained silent “I blew my chances” you turn over “good night Harry”

He goes to open his mouth but can’t find the right words any words to make things better

You sigh when you feel him lay back down wiping your tears

The next morning it’s Friday and you drag your body out of bed before the alarm goes off not like you slept, you have been battling a tension headache. You get ready and go to the kitchen and make Harry’s smoothie before leaving resuming your routine. You go back upstairs and  push his hair out of his face he shifts around “Good morning” you whisper before kissing his cheek signaling his que to wake-up and you’re out the door. At work your productive enough so you leave early. Your headache finally calmed down after 4 Advil pills. You grab your things and drive home it’s 2 o'clock so Harry should still be in the studio. When you pull up to your driveway you don’t see his car so you sigh in relief, you did  not wish to recap last night your emotions got the best of you, you don’t even know why you complained about the wine situation he always poured wine for your guests. 

As you walk in the door however you almost freeze seeing Harry sitting by the couch listening to his music writing.

“Pet home early!” he says with a smile on his face 

“Yea got finished early” you speak softly “why are you home? thought you had studio time” 

“Eh Jeff ‘nd I got into a heated discussion” he jokes “thought it’d be best if we cooled off” He was lying he spent all day at home waiting for you making calls and the fact that you were early made it perfect because now you couldn’t say no. “Glad yeh’r home early! Would like to take yeh on a date”

“Why?” you ask suspicious of his motives 

He stands up “Yeh’r my girlfriend and its been 2 weeks too long”

“Oh i didn’t mean like that sorry” 

“Don’ worry bout it…So can i?” he asks you 

“What am i supposed to wear?”

“Anything yeh look amazing in anything!” he smiles 

“Yea but i don’t know,  where we are going?”

“A cute dress!” he solved your riddle 

You nod walking away. He hates the fact that you had become insecure about everything. You stood there with your puppy eyes and slightly pouty lip playing nervously with your fingers looking at him which was killing him to not hug you and give you reassuring kisses. You take 2 hours to get ready the outfit was the issue finally deciding on a bodycon maxi dress and you threw your hair up into a low messy updo.

You walk down the stairs barefoot “Ready?” Harry asks 

You shake your head “which shoes?” you ask  holding up 2 pairs of heel sandals

“Hmmm”  he smiles tapping his lip and stands up walking over to you he looks at them “try them on let me see” he analyzes and judges and picks his favorite 

“Ok ready” you say after putting on the shoes 

“You look amazing as always” he compliments 

“Thank you” You drive in silence to a high end Restaurant on the rooftop  of a tower down town You already know what you want as you both skim the menu but right now going over every single item included in each meal is better than addressing the issue. He clears his throat and you look up and smile. He places his hand on the table and you gently place yours in his. 

“So..” he begins He is interrupted by the waiter 

“Welcome to Bequoia!  Would you like to try our Cabernet?”  

Harry answers “Yes we would thank you!” He walked away and returned promptly “Do you know what you would like?”

 “Salmon” you say 

“Steak”  

“How would you like that cooked sir?”

“Medium”

“Ok I will have that right out for you” 

“Can yeh also bring another bottle of Cabernet please?” 

“Absolutely!”

 He looked at you and rubbed the back of your hand with his thumb “Pet i apologize for how i behaved” You smile “S not that i didn’t think yeh would be good enough its a problem of mine’nd if yeh want i will eat all your cooking!” he offers up a smile to make you feel better You barely smile in response “Never meant to. I just have a serious problem… perfectionist.” 

“Its ok Harry, shouldn’t have been so sensitive”  you say softly and wipe your tears away 

“No its not pet” he moves towards you “i’m sorry please don’t cry” he wraps his arm around you pulling you closer You nod and fight against the tears 

“Im sorry pet please” he begs

“It’s ok Harry you apologized”  

“But you’re crying” 

You giggle “Because I’m weird” you joke

“No not good night!” he says turning you around to face him “Now we’re gonna talk about this whether yeh like it or not!”

“Harry” you fuss

“Seriously over dinner?” You look at him with a blank  face “I didn’t even do anything was jus’ trying to help I’m sorry if i offended yeh” now he was the one that was irritated  You still say nothing as he is looking at you for a response  “Yeh could have said yeh cooked i wouldn’t have minded its just food!” You still give him a blank stare “Oh for the luv of! Bloody say something!” he commands 

You sigh and turn to look at the ceiling “it wasn’t a stupid dinner maybe to you it was but it meant more than that to me” you feel the tears well up. “I was supposed to make it perfect the whole house but you kept fixing things.” The first  tear rolled down your face “then you wouldn’t let me cook i had the recipes i was doing exactly what was written down. Then here you come correcting and adding shit. You undermined everything i did that day, like you didn’t trust that i could make anything good enough for your family.” You now dig the heels of your hands to your eyes trying to stop the flow

“Pet” he said softly feeling awful about his actions 

“What mother wants her son to be with a woman who can’t even cook Harry?!”. 

He frowned “my mum” 

“You wouldn’t even let me pour a glass of wine!”

He remained silent “I blew my chances” you turn over “good night Harry”

He goes to open his mouth but can’t find the right words any words to make things better

You sigh when you feel him lay back down wiping your tears

The next morning it’s Friday and you drag your body out of bed before the alarm goes off not like you slept, you have been battling a tension headache. You get ready and go to the kitchen and make Harry’s smoothie before leaving resuming your routine. You go back upstairs and  push his hair out of his face he shifts around “Good morning” you whisper before kissing his cheek signaling his que to wake-up and you’re out the door. At work your productive enough so you leave early. Your headache finally calmed down after 4 Advil pills. You grab your things and drive home it’s 2 o'clock so Harry should still be in the studio. When you pull up to your driveway you don’t see his car so you sigh in relief, you did  not wish to recap last night your emotions got the best of you, you don’t even know why you complained about the wine situation he always poured wine for your guests. 

As you walk in the door however you almost freeze seeing Harry sitting by the couch listening to his music writing.

“Pet home early!” he says with a smile on his face 

“Yea got finished early” you speak softly “why are you home? thought you had studio time” 

“Eh Jeff ‘nd I got into a heated discussion” he jokes “thought it’d be best if we cooled off” He was lying he spent all day at home waiting for you making calls and the fact that you were early made it perfect because now you couldn’t say no. “Glad yeh’r home early! Would like to take yeh on a date”

“Why?” you ask suspicious of his motives 

He stands up “Yeh’r my girlfriend and its been 2 weeks too long”

“Oh i didn’t mean like that sorry” 

“Don’ worry bout it…So can i?” he asks you 

“What am i supposed to wear?”

“Anything yeh look amazing in anything!” he smiles 

“Yea but i don’t know,  where we are going?”

“A cute dress!” he solved your riddle 

You nod walking away. He hates the fact that you had become insecure about everything. You stood there with your puppy eyes and slightly pouty lip playing nervously with your fingers looking at him which was killing him to not hug you and give you reassuring kisses. You take 2 hours to get ready the outfit was the issue finally deciding on a bodycon maxi dress and you threw your hair up into a low messy updo.

You walk down the stairs barefoot “Ready?” Harry asks 

You shake your head “which shoes?” you ask  holding up 2 pairs of heel sandals

“Hmmm”  he smiles tapping his lip and stands up walking over to you he looks at them “try them on let me see” he analyzes and judges and picks his favorite 

“Ok ready” you say after putting on the shoes 

“You look amazing as always” he compliments 

“Thank you” You drive in silence to a high end Restaurant on the rooftop  of a tower down town You already know what you want as you both skim the menu but right now going over every single item included in each meal is better than addressing the issue. He clears his throat and you look up and smile. He places his hand on the table and you gently place yours in his. 

“So..” he begins He is interrupted by the waiter 

“Welcome to Bequoia!  Would you like to try our Cabernet?”  

Harry answers “Yes we would thank you!” He walked away and returned promptly “Do you know what you would like?”

 “Salmon” you say 

“Steak”  

“How would you like that cooked sir?”

“Medium”

“Ok I will have that right out for you” 

“Can yeh also bring another bottle of Cabernet please?” 

“Absolutely!”

 He looked at you and rubbed the back of your hand with his thumb “Pet i apologize for how i behaved” You smile “S not that i didn’t think yeh would be good enough its a problem of mine’nd if yeh want i will eat all your cooking!” he offers up a smile to make you feel better You barely smile in response “Never meant to. I just have a serious problem… perfectionist.” 

“Its ok Harry, shouldn’t have been so sensitive”  you say softly and wipe your tears away 

“No its not pet” he moves towards you “i’m sorry please don’t cry” he wraps his arm around you pulling you closer You nod and fight against the tears 

“Im sorry pet please” he begs

“It’s ok Harry you apologized”  

“But you’re crying” 

You giggle “Because I’m weird” you joke

All day Harry had been doing it. All damn day! It was your first holiday together and you and Harry had decided to host dinner. You had the recipes from your mother and his. You followed the recipes to a ‘T’ ;however all day Harry kept interjecting.

“lets add a little brown sugar!”,“take the cookies out luv might burn the bottom, don wan tha”,“add more salt not there yet kinda bland”,“dice them smaller want the taste not the chunks”, “You have to baste it often or it would dry up up top”, “lets add this(wine) make the taste more bold!”

And now he had just hip bumped you over to the side complaining the sauce was burning and you weren’t stirring it fast enough turning down the  heat even after you said you got it he was still micromanaging, taking over. You huffed grabbing a bottle of water from the fridge, before going up the stairs to get ready they were arriving in 2 hours you were so angry you slam the door behind you. It was the slam that caught his attention quickly he jogged up the  stairs “Pet re yeh alright?”

“Yes!” you yell from inside the closet

“Wha’ re yeh doin’?”

“Getting ready!”

“K m gonna head down i added some red wine to the sauce it tastes amazing!” he said excitedly 

“Ok!” you say disinterested. You wanted this to be perfect you wanted his family to know you could be a great home keeper and take care of him. More importantly you wanted everyone to know you would be a great wife when the time came but Harry proved you wrong. You worried that maybe his micromanaging was because you were a terrible home keeper the readjustment of pillows and table scaping on the dining table and trinkets around your shared home. He thought you didn’t realize but you did, you thought nothing of it at first but, now it was like a sign a subliminal loud bright neon sign ‘you are shit at this!’

You get ready on a simple dress with a floor length cardigan on. 

“Ready?” Harry asks walking into the bathroom

“Yes” you answer

He wraps his arms around you “wow babe yeh look amazin’ ” 

“Thanks” you say flatly pushing him off

 He doesn’t catch on he’s too excited. Excited to see his family. 

When everyone arrived they greet you both with loving arms and messages bringing you  both gifts. Immediately you usher them to the dining room as they admire the new décor around the house. You go to open a bottle of wine only for Harry to grab it out of your hand

“I got this have a seat babe, know there’s a way to pour wine” he fills the glasses before raising his “to family nd luv’ ”

You all repeat  “to family and love” clanking each others glasses 

“lets eat!” 5 minutes pass by and there’s the first compliment

“This chicken is soo good have you tried it mum?”  Gemma asks

“Not yet still eating the risotto it’s amazing!” 

“Yea Y/N you did a good job!” your mom speaks to you

You shake your head “I didn’t cook Harry did, good job babe” and honestly it really was good 

“Harry you cook!?” your mom asks surprised

“Yes Mrs. Y/L/N” he says proudly 

“Oh good! Is there nothing you can’t do?”

He smiles in response loving the compliment 

“Anyway we were worried Y/N would be feeding you box dinners and take out everyday!”  she jokes making everyone else laugh. You give a tight lipped smile 

“Oh no she did most of the work I just helped”  

“Really is it true butterfly (your nickname)?” your mom asks you 

You sigh “No Harry cooked” you say once again shaking your head 

“You know I always got on her on learning to cook! Back in my day women had to know how to cook or you wouldn’t get married!” 

“That’s very true Hazza your mimi would get on me all the time” Anne chimes in

“Oh silly tradition” Harry reasons 

“Yea but i still think she should learn something if she wants to be a mother” your father scolds “mac and cheese even”

“I’ll learn dad so i can feed you when you’re old” you try to joke back making the table laugh a little

“Oh i don’t mind..”  

“Harry what did you put in this chicken?” Gemma’s Boyfriend Sean asks

 He smiles “I’ll give you the recipe mate ” 

“Please do so i can impress your sister”  he jokes

The rest of dinner went without  much word from you and afterwards you all stay seated around the dining table eating dessert drinking more wine and coffee 

“Oh my god Hazza! Yeh baked the cookies too?!” Anne asks after her first  bite

“Yes” you answer flatly for him 

“Damn did you do anything today?” your father asks you

“No she..” Harry tries to answer for you 

“I cleaned” you respond 

“Wha’s in this?” Gemma  asks as she holds up a piece of cake on her fork

“So  good!” your mom comments

 “And soft!” his mom adds

He shrugs smirking loving the compliments “can’t give away all my recipes!”  

“Yea but this is my recipe what did yeh add?” his mom asks 

He draws his lips together before imitating a zipper being closed on them with his fingers .You want this night to be over already by now. Your pride is defeated. Nothing that you did went right and everyone knows you can’t do much of anything. Your mom was relentless about your lack of cooking skills the alcohol getting to her which makes everyone laugh all night at you. When they start leaving you smile and say your goodbyes kissing away any hopes of being Mrs. Styles  because there’s no way Anne Twist is  going to let you marry her son not when you couldn’t even bake cookies! 

You rush to the kitchen to clean up the dishes. Harry walks into the kitchen happily sighing “you’re dad is funny!” 

“Yea!” you say focusing all your negative energy on the spots on the dishes

“Do they really call you butterfly?” he asks amused

“Yea” you say flatly 

“Cute!” he says with a boyish grin 

You plug away going through the dishes quickly

“Oh don’t clean those we can do it tomorrow” he  tries to stop you from cleaning the pots 

“I would rather do it tonight” you say not stopping 

“Well m tired from all that cooking I did” he jokes “mind  if i watch some tele?” 

“No!” you say feeling your anger coming to a boil. Your feet were sore all he did all day was sit by the island micromanaging only getting up to fix your mistakes. He kisses you on the cheek before walking away. You spend about an hour cleaning up. 

“I’m done going upstairs” you say to Harry as you dry your hands

 “ ‘M coming wait’f me” he says turning off the TV. He hums walking up with you

He chuckles "Gem is crazy!” he says remembering a joke she told 

You look around ignoring him “And your mum calling me ‘great’ that was endearing of her, she’s such a darling ” he says smiling watching you

“Yea” you respond not paying attention to him. Finally  he realizes you’re  in a sour mood

“Yeh ok pet?” he asks staring at you angrily shuffle through things in the drawer

“Yea!” you say sarcastically  

“Harry the great!” you grunt pulling open the drawer 

“What?”  he chuckles slightly

“Harry the great singer! Harry the great musician! Harry the great producer! Harry the great actor! Harry  the great chef!” you slam the drawer closed

“I’m fine, good night” you answer softly He watches you yank the covers back before getting in bed. He stares before going into the closet to change clothes. He has no idea why you are in such a bad mood you seemed fine earlier. He gets in bed and looks at you one more time“Y/N” he calls moving closer to you  

“Good night Harry” you stress softly turning away from him hiding your tears, he sighs turning the  other way.

In the morning you’re gone without good morning

Harry: no good morning today? he texts you 

Y/N: sorry big meeting today

He  knows you’re lying you would have told him earlier that week if it was true

Harry: whats wrong pet

Y/N: nothing. im cool as a cucumber

 Y/N: gotta go text later love you

He still can’t understand what happened so he calls Alexa his best friend to figure things out 

“Harold!

”“Aallleeeexaaaa!” he says 

She  laughs “up early” 

“Well couldn’t sleep” 

“Please Harry  my precious ears don’t need to hear that!” she  complains

“What did you do?”

“Nothing!”

“Uh huh so shes mad for no reason?” she asks “

Yes!”

“I did nothing i promise!”

“Yea oooh”

“Fuck” he whispered “i was just”

“Just nothing you fucked up” she teased

He chuckles "Gem is crazy!” he says remembering a joke she told 

You look around ignoring him “And your mum calling me ‘great’ that was endearing of her, she’s such a darling ” he says smiling watching you

“Yea” you respond not paying attention to him. Finally  he realizes you’re  in a sour mood

“Yeh ok pet?” he asks staring at you angrily shuffle through things in the drawer

“Yea!” you say sarcastically  

“Harry the great!” you grunt pulling open the drawer 

“What?”  he chuckles slightly 

“Harry the great!” you start as you undress aggressively  

“Harry the great singer! Harry the great musician! Harry the great producer! Harry the great actor! Harry  the great chef!” you slam the drawer closed

He laughs at your antics “where’s this comin from?”

"Y/N the walking sack of shit who cant even boil water” you speak walking around picking up your discarded clothes

His laughter quickly dies down realizing what you said “wait what?”

You sigh walking into bathroom mumbling ”Y/N the terrible! Y/N the terrible chef eat her food and you might die!” you’re being theatrical and sarcastic waving your hands in the air to keep from  crying

 “Babe” his brow furrows. Unsure if you’re joking or not

“Y/N the shitty homemaker! Y/N waste of space!” 

“Oi!” he yells “stop it! wha’s gotten yeh in this pissy mood?” he asks realizing you were very serious 

“Nothing!” you say walking past him 

“Wha do yeh mean nothin?  wha’s up with the attitude?” He asks following you into the bedroom

“I’m fine, good night” you answer softly He watches you yank the covers back before getting in bed. He stares before going into the closet to change clothes. He has no idea why you are in such a bad mood you seemed fine earlier. He gets in bed and looks at you one more time“Y/N” he calls moving closer to you  

“Good night Harry” you stress softly turning away from him hiding your tears, he sighs turning the  other way.

In the morning you’re gone without good morning

Harry: no good morning today? he texts you 

Y/N: sorry big meeting today

He  knows you’re lying you would have told him earlier that week if it was true

Harry: whats wrong pet

Y/N: nothing. im cool as a cucumber

 Y/N: gotta go text later love you

He still can’t understand what happened so he calls Alexa his best friend to figure things out 

“Harold!

”“Aallleeeexaaaa!” he says 

She  laughs “up early” 

“Well couldn’t sleep” 

“Please Harry  my precious ears don’t need to hear that!” she  complains 

He chuckles “no i think Y/N is mad at me” 

“What did you do?”

“Nothing!”

“Uh huh so shes mad for no reason?” she asks “

Yes!”

“Harry” she doesn’t  believe him 

“I did nothing i promise!” 

“Well lets just  figure out where you went wrong”

He sighed in response 

“Oh how was the  dinner by the way?” 

“Amazing everyone had a blast!” he said smiling

“Good. Sooo did you call her fat?” 

“Really? no”

“Just asking….insult her cooking?”  

“ M not stupid no” Alexa laughed “But she kept telling everyone i cooked don’ kno why”

“Did you?”

“Well…”

“Seriously?” she said in a flat tone 

“I didn’t cook that much she did majority of it!” he argued

*So let me guess you did the Harry thing overshadowed?” 

“No i didnt!” he defends himself

“So you didn’t  add your own ingredients?” He remained silent 

“Uh huh! i see told her to do it your way instead” 

He  sighed “just trying to help” he mumbled  

“Not like that you idiot!”

“Oi!” 

“You do that shit to me all the time  its really annoying can’t  imagine being your girlfriend and trying to impress your family” she sang the last part 

“Oooh” he responded softly

“Yea oooh”

“Fuck” he whispered “i was just”

“Just nothing you fucked up” she teased

He sighed  “now what do i do?”

“I don’t know thats a doozy, i gotta run text me when you come up with a resolution maybe i can save you more trouble!”

He honestly was just trying to help. He could apologize plus your cooking wasn’t that bad. He had no time to think of other ideas because he was to be at the studio soon. 

Even though he was in the studio his mind drifted to you often so he snuck away to call you.“Hello?”  you answer 

“Hi butterfly” he speaks softly 

“Hi Harry” you greet. “Are you ok?” he never calls when he’s in the studio

“Yea….hows your day?”

You shrug “just work..” its awkward “how’s yours?”

“Good ok i guess… can we talk bout last night?”

“No” you say in a flat tone

“Come on pet i…” 

You interrupt him “im not talking about it so if you have nothing to say im hanging up” you’re beyond irritated 

“No don’t!”…  he  remained silent “Y/N” 

“Harry” your tone  warns him

He feels worse “pet please”

“Go back you have things to do” you reason  “see you at home I love you” 

He sighed deeply “love you too” He did his best rushed through songs. You however didn’t get  home till late and you met a sleeping Harry. You did your best to be silent and sneak into bed but he felt the dip in the mattress.

“Pet?” he asks turning his head to face you 

“Yes good night” you say  kissing his lips and laying  down

He sighs turning on his lamp “Y/N” 

“Go back to sleep Harry” you stress 

“No not good night!” he says turning you around to face him “Now we’re gonna talk about this whether yeh like it or not!”

“Harry” you fuss

“Seriously over dinner?” You look at him with a blank  face “I didn’t even do anything was jus’ trying to help I’m sorry if i offended yeh” now he was the one that was irritated  You still say nothing as he is looking at you for a response  “Yeh could have said yeh cooked i wouldn’t have minded its just food!” You still give him a blank stare “Oh for the luv of! Bloody say something!” he commands 

You sigh and turn to look at the ceiling “it wasn’t a stupid dinner maybe to you it was but it meant more than that to me” you feel the tears well up. “I was supposed to make it perfect the whole house but you kept fixing things.” The first  tear rolled down your face “then you wouldn’t let me cook i had the recipes i was doing exactly what was written down. Then here you come correcting and adding shit. You undermined everything i did that day, like you didn’t trust that i could make anything good enough for your family.” You now dig the heels of your hands to your eyes trying to stop the flow

“Pet” he said softly feeling awful about his actions 

“What mother wants her son to be with a woman who can’t even cook Harry?!”. 

He frowned “my mum” 

“You wouldn’t even let me pour a glass of wine!”

He remained silent “I blew my chances” you turn over “good night Harry”

He goes to open his mouth but can’t find the right words any words to make things better

You sigh when you feel him lay back down wiping your tears

The next morning it’s Friday and you drag your body out of bed before the alarm goes off not like you slept, you have been battling a tension headache. You get ready and go to the kitchen and make Harry’s smoothie before leaving resuming your routine. You go back upstairs and  push his hair out of his face he shifts around “Good morning” you whisper before kissing his cheek signaling his que to wake-up and you’re out the door. At work your productive enough so you leave early. Your headache finally calmed down after 4 Advil pills. You grab your things and drive home it’s 2 o'clock so Harry should still be in the studio. When you pull up to your driveway you don’t see his car so you sigh in relief, you did  not wish to recap last night your emotions got the best of you, you don’t even know why you complained about the wine situation he always poured wine for your guests. 

As you walk in the door however you almost freeze seeing Harry sitting by the couch listening to his music writing.

“Pet home early!” he says with a smile on his face 

“Yea got finished early” you speak softly “why are you home? thought you had studio time” 

“Eh Jeff ‘nd I got into a heated discussion” he jokes “thought it’d be best if we cooled off” He was lying he spent all day at home waiting for you making calls and the fact that you were early made it perfect because now you couldn’t say no. “Glad yeh’r home early! Would like to take yeh on a date”

“Why?” you ask suspicious of his motives 

He stands up “Yeh’r my girlfriend and its been 2 weeks too long”

“Oh i didn’t mean like that sorry” 

“Don’ worry bout it…So can i?” he asks you 

“What am i supposed to wear?”

“Anything yeh look amazing in anything!” he smiles 

“Yea but i don’t know,  where we are going?”

“A cute dress!” he solved your riddle 

You nod walking away. He hates the fact that you had become insecure about everything. You stood there with your puppy eyes and slightly pouty lip playing nervously with your fingers looking at him which was killing him to not hug you and give you reassuring kisses. You take 2 hours to get ready the outfit was the issue finally deciding on a bodycon maxi dress and you threw your hair up into a low messy updo.

You walk down the stairs barefoot “Ready?” Harry asks 

You shake your head “which shoes?” you ask  holding up 2 pairs of heel sandals

“Hmmm”  he smiles tapping his lip and stands up walking over to you he looks at them “try them on let me see” he analyzes and judges and picks his favorite 

“Ok ready” you say after putting on the shoes 

“You look amazing as always” he compliments 

“Thank you” You drive in silence to a high end Restaurant on the rooftop  of a tower down town You already know what you want as you both skim the menu but right now going over every single item included in each meal is better than addressing the issue. He clears his throat and you look up and smile. He places his hand on the table and you gently place yours in his. 

“So..” he begins He is interrupted by the waiter 

“Welcome to Bequoia!  Would you like to try our Cabernet?”  

Harry answers “Yes we would thank you!” He walked away and returned promptly “Do you know what you would like?”

 “Salmon” you say 

“Steak”  

“How would you like that cooked sir?”

“Medium”

“Ok I will have that right out for you” 

“Can yeh also bring another bottle of Cabernet please?” 

“Absolutely!”

 He looked at you and rubbed the back of your hand with his thumb “Pet i apologize for how i behaved” You smile “S not that i didn’t think yeh would be good enough its a problem of mine’nd if yeh want i will eat all your cooking!” he offers up a smile to make you feel better You barely smile in response “Never meant to. I just have a serious problem… perfectionist.” 

“Its ok Harry, shouldn’t have been so sensitive”  you say softly and wipe your tears away 

“No its not pet” he moves towards you “i’m sorry please don’t cry” he wraps his arm around you pulling you closer You nod and fight against the tears 

“Im sorry pet please” he begs

“It’s ok Harry you apologized”  

“But you’re crying” 

You giggle “Because I’m weird” you joke

Shoot me a message/ask/comment with the prompt and fandom you’ll be writing for! Thanks, everyone!

title: Promises
body:
- the one where Grammy means more to Harry then Y/N (part three)

Part 1

Part 2

Master List

A/N: Quickest update I’ve ever given! But hope you enjoy + it ain’t proof-read so yeah.

It’s been over three month since Harry met Y/N at Zonko’s and since then Harry hadn’t stopped calling her or texting her. Harry knew he was being annoying but he couldn’t stop, he couldn’t let her walk out of his life yet again.

Harry had even showed up at her place few times but those were nothing but a slam of the door on his face. However, the first time he showed up, she had actually listened to what he had to say but when he started to show up often she started to shut the door as soon as she saw it was him. He even spent two nights at the porch sitting; eventually falling asleep on the small sofa she had outside. The next morning he hadn’t actually met Y/N at all she had gone to work while he was asleep. However, he did get a sandwich and a bottle of orange juice along with a note which just told him to stop disturbing her and he was being pathetic. Harry already knew he was being pathetic, but he didn’t stop, he couldn’t stop.

Harry knew he was creating problems in her relation with some ‘Jake’ but he didn’t care and if he was honest he was kind of happy about it. He knew, he was being selfish but he truly didn’t care. He wasn’t usually like this, he wasn’t someone who’d break someone else’s relation just so he could be with his love but over time Harry realized Y/N wanted to be with him too, she just didn’t want to leave Jake out of courtesy. Harry still remembered what she said when he first showed up at her place.

“Harry, I can’t,” she had tears in her eyes. “I’m with Jake and I can’t just leave him because you decided to show up after a year.”

The desperation present in her voice and the need in her eyes was enough to tell Harry she wanted to be with him too.

Harry had even accidentally talked to Jake. Jake had picked up Y/N’s phone once and told him to call back after a while because Y/N was in shower. Harry had curiously asked who he was and he told him he was Jake, Y/N’s boyfriend. Before Harry could say anything else Jake somehow realized he was the one who was texting and sending flowers to his girlfriend. The next thing he did was to tell Harry to back off, but he never did.

Harry threw his phone on the couch before going to the kitchen for getting some wine. He had just called Y/N and then sent two texts afterwards, telling her he loved her and he was never going to give up.

Harry took out the wine from the fridge and made his way back to living room. It was raining heavily then, Harry plopped down on his couch. He checked his phone in hope of a reply from Y/N but she hadn’t just like every other time. Harry sighed before turning the TV on.

Harry was mindlessly watching F.R.I.E.N.D.S, while thinking about Y/N when he heard his door bell rang. Harry slowly got up from the couch and went towards the door having no idea who it’d be.

“Coming!” Harry yelled when the person behind the door impatiently rang his bell non-stop.

“Coming, coming, coming,” Harry made a small jog towards the door and opened it finally making the person stop abusing the bell. However, before Harry could even see the person, something was thrown at his face. He looked down at his hand which now carried a bouquet of flowers. Harry realized it was the bouquet he had sent Y/N that morning.

“You asshole! He broke up with me!” It was Y/N.

Harry was shocked to see her there, with water dripping from her raven hair, sweater soaked and boots filled with water. But as much he was shocked, he was ever so happy.

“Are you gonna just look at my face or would you say something!” Y/N yelled.

“Oh, yeah - I’m sorry?” He wasn’t sorry at all, in fact a small smile tugged itself on his lips.

“You’re fucking smiling!” Y/N yelled furiously throwing her hands in the air. “He told me he couldn’t be with me if my ex keeps sending me flowers and call me all the time!”

“I’m sorry,” Harry forced a frown on his face. “Come in, you’re wet,” he opened the door further and stepped aside for her to get in.

Y/N stomped in throwing her boots off. “You know you’re fucking selfish!”

“I know, I told you that but you never really listened,” Harry said timidly.

“God Harry, I wanna punch you in the face! At first you tell me some shits and make me leave, then you realize what you said after a whole damn year and then you make my boyfriend leave! For fucks sake I don’t know what to fucking do!” Y/N exclaimed pulling her hair slightly as tears appeared on her face.

“Y/N,” Harry tried to calm her putting a hand on her shoulder but she quickly pushed him away.

“Don’t fucking touch me!!” she yelled. “I don’t get it, why things have to happen when you fucking want! When you thought you didn’t need me, you tossed me aside like a toy and when you felt like you needed me, you went crazy and just created a situation where my boyfriend had no option but to leave!”

“It’s not true,” Harry was cut off.

“'It’s not true’, you say! Then what is? You fucking- ugh you fucking didn’t even call me. If I mean so much to you then why didn’t you fucking call me?”

“I called you, Y/N. But your phone was off,” Harry argued but he didn’t raise his voice, he didn’t have the right - he knew that.

“Two days, three days, alright 7 days, after that? I was with you for five years, we were friends for two years before that, I at least deserved one month waiting, didn’t I? But you were making out with that French model after literally two weeks,” Y/N chuckled. “I was stupid to think I meant at least something to you.”

“Y/N you mean everything to me,” Harry said desperately.

“You didn’t make me feel like it, you just made me feel like a toy, you used me then threw me away!” Y/N said again. “I don’t know why I even came here.”

Y/N was about to walk out again but Harry sprinted after and pulled her by her arm, but he made sure he wasn’t hurting.

He won’t let her walk away yet again.

“Let me go!” Y/N said trying free herself from his grip, but his grip was firm.

“Please, hear me out!” Harry said.

“I heard you at Zonko’s,” she argued, still trying to set herself free from his grip.

“Please,” Harry said loosening his grip, he didn’t want to make her feel uncomfortable in any way possible, “Just, please - can you seat down for a minute?”

Y/N said nothing but she made her way to his sofa and sat down hugging herself, the wet clothes were making her feel cold.

“You wanna change?” Harry asked.

“No,” she replied curtly.

Harry sighed and sat down next to her.

It was his fault really, and he was paying for what he did. Only if he called her tried to get her back, back then they wouldn’t have in this situation. Y/N would’ve been with him this whole time. But he didn’t, he just forgot her. Harry still didn’t know how he managed to do that and how he managed to live over a year without her.

“Y/N I know I was an asshole and I’m truly sorry about what I did.”

“Sorry doesn’t fucking cut it off.”

“I know! I’ll do whatever to make you forgive me, please.”

“I hate you so much you know that,” Y/N looked down as the tears ran down her already wet cheek.

“Love you don’t mean that,” Harry knew it but that didn’t stop his heart to drop. Harry hated himself. He truly messed up and he can never forgive himself for making her feel like that.

Harry scooted closure to Y/N and wrapped his arm around Y/N’s shaking form. Harry absolutely hated to see Y/N cry but knowing it was for him, he just want dug a hole in the ground and disappear, but he had to make things right with her. He loved her and he was not going to let her go like the last time.

“Y/N-” Harry was taken off guard as Y/N threw her arms over his shoulder as a huge sob racked through her body. Harry didn’t waste any time to wrap his arms around her. Harry could feel his whole body getting wet for Y/N’s clothes but he didn’t care. He put his chin over Y/N’s head as he kept mumbling how sorry he was and how much he loved her.

“I missed you so much and it felt like you completely forgot me, it felt as if you didn’t even know I ever existed,” Y/N sobbed.

“I know, I’m so sorry,” Harry said as he felt his own tear falling.

“Why would you do that?” Y/N pulled the collar of his t-shirt looking at him desperately; tears running down; eyes puffy; nose red and cheek flushed.

“I don’t know, I’m so sorry,” He looked down at her. His heart broke seeing her like that and knowing he caused it, he felt his heart shattering

Y/N let go of his collars as she buried her face in her hand. Harry quickly pulled her closure to him and rocked her back and forth as she continued to cry.

“Okay,” Y/N said after a while. Her sobs died down as she sat straight. Y/N wiped her face with her sweater sleeve, even thought it was wet itself and looked up at Harry.

“I’ll give you one chance, but we are not in a relation or anything - not even friends. We’re starting from the very beginning. And I swear, if you break my heart again Harry, you’ll never see my face ever again,” Y/N said sternly making a huge grin appear on Harry face.

“Oh my god, thank you so much!” Harry hugged Y/N again. “I won’t let you down this time, I promise.”

Harry was shocked to see her there, with water dripping from her raven hair, sweater soaked and boots filled with water. But as much he was shocked, he was ever so happy.

“Are you gonna just look at my face or would you say something!” Y/N yelled.

“Oh, yeah - I’m sorry?” He wasn’t sorry at all, in fact a small smile tugged itself on his lips.

“You’re fucking smiling!” Y/N yelled furiously throwing her hands in the air. “He told me he couldn’t be with me if my ex keeps sending me flowers and call me all the time!”

“I’m sorry,” Harry forced a frown on his face. “Come in, you’re wet,” he opened the door further and stepped aside for her to get in.

Y/N stomped in throwing her boots off. “You know you’re fucking selfish!”

“I know, I told you that but you never really listened,” Harry said timidly.

“God Harry, I wanna punch you in the face! At first you tell me some shits and make me leave, then you realize what you said after a whole damn year and then you make my boyfriend leave! For fucks sake I don’t know what to fucking do!” Y/N exclaimed pulling her hair slightly as tears appeared on her face.

“Y/N,” Harry tried to calm her putting a hand on her shoulder but she quickly pushed him away.

“Don’t fucking touch me!!” she yelled. “I don’t get it, why things have to happen when you fucking want! When you thought you didn’t need me, you tossed me aside like a toy and when you felt like you needed me, you went crazy and just created a situation where my boyfriend had no option but to leave!”

“It’s not true,” Harry was cut off.

“'It’s not true’, you say! Then what is? You fucking- ugh you fucking didn’t even call me. If I mean so much to you then why didn’t you fucking call me?”

“I called you, Y/N. But your phone was off,” Harry argued but he didn’t raise his voice, he didn’t have the right - he knew that.

“Two days, three days, alright 7 days, after that? I was with you for five years, we were friends for two years before that, I at least deserved one month waiting, didn’t I? But you were making out with that French model after literally two weeks,” Y/N chuckled. “I was stupid to think I meant at least something to you.”

“Y/N you mean everything to me,” Harry said desperately.

“You didn’t make me feel like it, you just made me feel like a toy, you used me then threw me away!” Y/N said again. “I don’t know why I even came here.”

Y/N was about to walk out again but Harry sprinted after and pulled her by her arm, but he made sure he wasn’t hurting.

He won’t let her walk away yet again.

“Let me go!” Y/N said trying free herself from his grip, but his grip was firm.

“Please, hear me out!” Harry said.

“I heard you at Zonko’s,” she argued, still trying to set herself free from his grip.

“Please,” Harry said loosening his grip, he didn’t want to make her feel uncomfortable in any way possible, “Just, please - can you seat down for a minute?”

Y/N said nothing but she made her way to his sofa and sat down hugging herself, the wet clothes were making her feel cold.

“You wanna change?” Harry asked.

“No,” she replied curtly.

Harry sighed and sat down next to her.

It was his fault really, and he was paying for what he did. Only if he called her tried to get her back, back then they wouldn’t have in this situation. Y/N would’ve been with him this whole time. But he didn’t, he just forgot her. Harry still didn’t know how he managed to do that and how he managed to live over a year without her.

“Y/N I know I was an asshole and I’m truly sorry about what I did.”

“Sorry doesn’t fucking cut it off.”

“I know! I’ll do whatever to make you forgive me, please.”

“I hate you so much you know that,” Y/N looked down as the tears ran down her already wet cheek.

“Love you don’t mean that,” Harry knew it but that didn’t stop his heart to drop. Harry hated himself. He truly messed up and he can never forgive himself for making her feel like that.

Harry scooted closure to Y/N and wrapped his arm around Y/N’s shaking form. Harry absolutely hated to see Y/N cry but knowing it was for him, he just want dug a hole in the ground and disappear, but he had to make things right with her. He loved her and he was not going to let her go like the last time.

“Y/N-” Harry was taken off guard as Y/N threw her arms over his shoulder as a huge sob racked through her body. Harry didn’t waste any time to wrap his arms around her. Harry could feel his whole body getting wet for Y/N’s clothes but he didn’t care. He put his chin over Y/N’s head as he kept mumbling how sorry he was and how much he loved her.

“I missed you so much and it felt like you completely forgot me, it felt as if you didn’t even know I ever existed,” Y/N sobbed.

“I know, I’m so sorry,” Harry said as he felt his own tear falling.

“Why would you do that?” Y/N pulled the collar of his t-shirt looking at him desperately; tears running down; eyes puffy; nose red and cheek flushed.

“I don’t know, I’m so sorry,” He looked down at her. His heart broke seeing her like that and knowing he caused it, he felt his heart shattering

“I’ll give you one chance, but we are not in a relation or anything - not even friends. We’re starting from the very beginning. And I swear, if you break my heart again Harry, you’ll never see my face ever again,” Y/N said sternly making a huge grin appear on Harry face.

hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: but what about mafia harry who has a little bub and is always so gentle around her but one day the missus brings her up to...
question: but what about mafia harry who has a little bub and is always so gentle around her but one day the missus brings her up to harry’s bar or something because little bubs misses daddy but she hears h yelling at people and she gets all scared and won’t let go of the missus and won’t even look at him:((
answer:
“y’had one fucking job and y’just have to be utter shit at doing it, do you?”


harry really wishes that his baby bub didn’t have to see that right with her cute adorable eyes that now have been reduced to vulnerable crying ones, her tender three-year old figure not being tainted with the bar’s awful fucking smell at all because all she wanted was to see her daddy from how much she misses him.

better yet, harry wishes he didn’t even do it in the first place regardless of her being there because now, his own daughter won’t even look at him.

“best if you leave for a while.”

his missus says, both in a little anger and a tad more heartbreak as she’s consoling their bub right in her arms, not thrashing anymore but it feels like she still was from how violent her cries were, chest heaving up with sobs and head being buried to her neck.

“s-she — n-need to get her to look at me.”

harry begs and more-on says to himself because now that they’ve come home did he realize where he went wrong; fucking up so bad that all his angel could say was no whenever he tried to carry her.

he’s sobbing now too and he really just wants to apologize and get to his knees so his bub could forgive him, not knowing that his display of anger back there was still replaying on his baby’s mind and how she got so scared by it.

“i’m sorry.”

harry shakily lets out while he offers his finger for his bub to take that she just won’t at the moment, the thought behind it making his heart break even more than the (lack of) action itself.

he can’t take her cries because he knows he’s the one who’s caused it and this isn’t anymore about him accidentally breaking his bub’s favorite bottle or not kissing her on the cheeks as usual —

this was about him scaring her.

“m’sorry — f-fuck, i’m sorry, angel.”
